scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && tsc
scripts.cron:one:dry: DRY_RUN=true RUN_SCOPE=one LOOP=false node --loader ts-node/esm src/jobs/weeklyReminder.dev.ts
scripts.cron:one:send: DRY_RUN=false RUN_SCOPE=one LOOP=false node --loader ts-node/esm src/jobs/weeklyReminder.dev.ts
scripts.cron:all:dry: DRY_RUN=true RUN_SCOPE=all LOOP=false node --loader ts-node/esm src/jobs/weeklyReminder.dev.ts
scripts.cron:all:send: DRY_RUN=false RUN_SCOPE=all LOOP=false node --loader ts-node/esm src/jobs/weeklyReminder.dev.ts
scripts.cron:loop:all:dry: DRY_RUN=true RUN_SCOPE=all LOOP=true node --loader ts-node/esm src/jobs/weeklyReminder.dev.ts
scripts.cron:loop:all:send: DRY_RUN=false RUN_SCOPE=all LOOP=true node --loader ts-node/esm src/jobs/weeklyReminder.dev.ts
